name: Soul Window
description:
Soul Window is a simple platformer made for Mini Jam 121 in which you play as a cat who must return lost souls to the sleeping. The theme of the jam was reflection, which inspired me to use souls as a concept, since they are reflections of the self. The limitation of the jam was windows as a mechanic, so I created literal windows to the spirit world in which you can collect the lost souls. This is my very first game jam, so I hope you enjoy!

Controls

  • WASD / Arrow Keys — Move
  • Space — Jump
  • E — Interact
